synonyms: caturtha-caraṇe—in the fourth line; cāri—four; bha-kāra—of the letter bha; prakāśa—manifestations; ataeva—therefore; śabda-alaṅkāra—ornamental use of different sounds; anuprāsa—alliteration.
translation: "In the fourth line the letter 'bha' occurs four times. This arrangement of alliteration is a pleasing ornamental use of sounds.
